## PnpmOptionsConfiguration.pnpmStorePath property

The path for PNPM to use as the store directory.

Will be overridden by environment variable RUSH\_PNPM\_STORE\_PATH

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly pnpmStorePath: string;
```
